title: DJ Sona bugs & Exhaust bug(Summoner spell) & Pick Pocket(Mastery) bug
body:
So, I figured I would try the North American forums - I have tried over and over to report bugs on EUW forum and board, and I never get a response.

**This is a bug I have reported for years, it's about pick pocket(the utility mastery), it has soon been bugged for 3 years.**
http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/suggestions-bug-reports-en/fgXRfV8z-mastery-bandit-buff-count-resets-level-up-2yr-old-bug

In short: The gold counter resets every time you level up.

**Here is a thread someone made on DJ Sona skin which has several bugs.**
http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/suggestions-bug-reports-en/xNkz2W43-dj-sona-bugs-that-need-to-be-fixed

In short: several minor visual bugs.

**Exhaust bug(Game breaking):**
http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/suggestions-bug-reports-en/1LJk0Hrn-exhaust-somtimes-does-not-go-off

On a daily I have problems with exhaust, especially when playing Sona. It simply refuse to go off, this happens even without CC and in range I have witnessed myself many times now spam exhausting a target up to 10 times over 2 seconds where it just refuse to go off. Often resulting in free kills for the enemy. This is incredibly frustrating, I compete in tournaments and this really really bothers me.





I would be eternally grateful for a response - just a "Now we know" would be awesome. I know this place gets a lot more attention than EUW(I don't blame them, they are simply few and fairly inactive).

I apologize for reporting 3 in one thread.

Sincerely,

ArmÀ-EUW

replies.body:
Hiya! 

I left a comment on the DJ Sona post. I'm on the skins team, so I can take a look into those on Monday. As for the other issues, I can pass them on to the proper teams to take a look at as well. 

I can update this thread once we've looked into these issues. ^-^

Thanks for the report!
Wow thank you so much that means a lot to me, take care and please feel free to update <3

Update time! 

I've gone ahead and responded to the DJ Sona thread with additional info regarding the bugs. In some cases, I was unable to repro the issue, and more information would be helpful in getting to the bottom of the issue! 

Regarding the exhaust issue, I was unable to repro it. Any specific steps to recreate the bug would be much appreciated. 

Thanks for bringing the Pickpocket buff counter to our attention - we're looking into it.

Thanks, I honestly don't know exactly what triggers the exhaust bug. I just know it happens frequently when I play Sona(And others judging by the replies). It is likely that it has something to do with powerchord and her spells to do, but it doesn't happen all the time, Ill try to figure it out.

This time it happened when Jayce went on to me, I had 2 charges and was going for powerchord exhaust. Except the exhaust refused to go off again. It certainly doesn't happen every time.

I do believe you are able to cast heal/barrier/smite/exhaust/clarity (given you have the range to do so) even while CC'ed of course suppression is the exception to this 
While obviously Teleport can't be used while CC'ed and neither can flash 

I believe that's how it's supposed to work anyhow
I think silence stops you, that's about it. Knock up can also stop flashing.
What exactly is wrong with exhaust? I have noticed it being unreliable but never pinpointed the issue. It seems the range is lower than indicated? Otherwise it's an issue of lag.

The problem is sometimes it refuse to go off, I experience this daily, in fact I just had it happening two or three times today in tournaments again.
Even in range and no lag it just refuse to go off.

Huh. I'm a Sona main, and have had issues with exhaust a lot. I just thought it was me being bad at clicking. Maybe there is indeed a bug?

It's certainly not lag, in any case. I've a steady 20 ms.

Yep, it's a bug. I thought I was bad for a while as well, I thought maybe it was the range.

But as I payed more attention to it, it became clear. I also *feel* like when it doesnt work, and I use another spell sometimes it works right away.
